original_text: From the east side of the Jordan River, there were 120,000 soldiers who knew how to use many different kinds of weapons. Those men belonged to the tribes of Reuben, Gad and the other half tribe of Manasseh.
korean_text: 요단 저편 르우벤 자손과 갓 자손과 므낫세 반 지파 중에서 모든 무기를 가지고 능히 싸우는 자가 십이만 명이었더라

sentences.original_text: From the east side of the Jordan River
who knew how to use many different kinds of weapons
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 여러 종류의 무기를 사용하는 법을 알았습니다

sentences.original_text: Those men belonged to the tribes of Reuben
Gad and the other half tribe of Manasseh
sentences.korean_translation: 갓 지파와 므낫세의 반쪽 지파에 속했습니다
